code: import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend);function LineGraph(data,region){var options={scales:{yAxes:{title:{display:true,text:"Milliseconds",font:{size:15}},ticks:{precision:0}},xAxes:{title:{display:true,text:"Time",font:{size:15}}}},plugins:{legend:{position:'bottom'},title:{display:true,text:region}}};var labels=data[region].tests.map(function(d){return d.time;});var averageLatency=data[region].tests.map(function(d){return d.runtime;});var lineGraphData={labels:labels,datasets:[{label:"Avg.
